participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, energetic, and passionate about sports and gaming.
participant_1.background: I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day. my favourite food is ice cream. No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes. I rode horses in the snow with my friends last winter. i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, nurturing, and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure if I'll be programming this weekend, but I'll definitely be enjoying my morning coffee. i drive a honda civic. I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work. I love my students. I grew up with my parents and siblings.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a long bike ride.
That sounds really nice! I love bike riding, but I don't get to do it very often.
Me neither, I wish I could do it more often. What are your hobbies?
I like to read, go for walks, and play video games.
Oh, I love reading too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I read all sorts of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
I've never really been into historical fiction, but I'll have to give it a try.
You should! It's really interesting to learn about different time periods.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! Do you like to play video games?
I love video games! I play mostly single-player games, but I also like to play multiplayer games with my friends.
Me too! I love playing games with my friends. What are some of your favorite games?
I love playing The Witcher 3, Red Dead Redemption 2, and Skyrim.
I've heard great things about The Witcher 3! I've been meaning to try it.
You definitely should! It's an amazing game.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
